technologies.title: Choose an IoT sensor
technologies.description: Sensors, LoRa gateways, 2G 3G 4G routers… We help you find the sensor that will provide the right data for your use case.

integration.title: We integrate more than 650 IoT sensor models on our platforms!
integration.description: With nearly 50 sensor manufacturing partners and 15 connectivity providers in M2M (Machine to Machine) and IoT (Internet of Things) worldwide, we support you in your project.

expertise.part2: at the service of your project!

logistics.desc: Hardware and integration of M2M SIM cards

faq.title: More than 15 years of experience at the service of your project

a1.part1: Les objets connectés sont des appareils équipés de technologies qui leur permettent de se connecter à Internet, comme des capteurs IoT, pour collecter des informations.
a1.full: Data refers to the information gathered by connected objects, such as temperature measurements, used to analyze and optimize processes. In summary, connected objects capture and transmit data, while data is the useful information extracted for various applications. This distinction is essential to choosing the right IoT sensors.
